title: What font is this?
content:
Need to know what font the Champions Cup and the 2009 are set in?  
I know Iâ€™ve seen it before but I cannot remember where.  
The Hockey Association wants it redrawn even though someone has  
already created this thing. They apparently do not have the eps file  
from the first time it was created. Stupid.

Please help if you can.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100102135110im_/http:/typophile.com/files/ChampionsCupLogo_6362.jpg)
author: renuance
